channel.title: Website/Sprited webclient/Server project!
channel.description:
Woohoo finally i got this all going! lets have a look on my website.. on it.. its got..
Development Diary Forums Featured server status (only i can edit/add) Webclient for each world. (3 worlds so far) Online/offline status New Gameframe on webclient Updates list (starting from website publication)
and alot more!
Server has:
about 5 working short minigames Full working range with projectiles Full working slayer against monsters Full working 99 levelup interface! Working jad minigame with firecape reward (glitch) All items are 1gp (alch/shop) Teleports interface on the quest tab and so much more!
Check it all out
site: www.toonscape.bravehost.com
Webclient: www.toonscape.bravehost.com/world2.html
Server ip: toonscape.no-ip.org
sorry if this is advertising but im merly showing my project.. if this is wrong.. someone please inform a mod..
Thanks alot guys!
William - Toon Ltd

thanks alot for the support guys

shouldnt be long till its all working

Woohoo finally i got this all going! lets have a look on my website… on it… its got…

Development Diary
Forums
Featured server status (only i can edit/add)
Webclient for each world. (3 worlds so far)
Online/offline status
New Gameframe on webclient
Updates list (starting from website publication)

and alot more!

about 5 working short minigames
Full working range with projectiles
Full working slayer against monsters
Full working 99 levelup interface!
Working jad minigame with firecape reward
(glitch) All items are 1gp (alch/shop)
Teleports interface on the quest tab
and so much more!
